channel.title: CVE Feed for WESEEK, Inc. -- GROWI (v4.2 Series)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WESEEK, Inc. -- GROWI (v4.2 Series)

item.title: CVE-2021-20672|2024-08-03T17:45:45.518Z -- weseek%2C%20inc. -- growi%20%28v4.2%20series%29
item.description: Reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability due to insufficient verification of URL query parameters in GROWI (v4.2 Series) versions from v4.2.0 to v4.2.7 allows remote attackers to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20673|2024-08-03T17:45:45.477Z -- weseek%2C%20inc. -- growi%20%28v4.2%20series%29
item.description: Stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in Admin Page of GROWI (v4.2 Series) versions from v4.2.0 to v4.2.7 allows remote authenticated attackers to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.
